actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure in lieu of S. 3052.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Percy. With written report No. 97-685.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 1018.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for fiscal year 1983.
short_title: Board for International Broadcasting Supplemental Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1983

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Supplemental Authorization Act, fiscal year 1983 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for FY 1983.

titles.title: Board for International Broadcasting Supplemental Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1983
An original bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for fiscal year 1983.
